summary: Investigated Cloudflare 521 error. All services running (PM2, Nginx, backend on port 3000). Firewall allows ports 80/443. Restarted backend server and reloaded Nginx. Services appear healthy - 521 may have been temporary or resolved.
current_status: All services online: server (port 3000), Nginx (port 80), PM2 services running. Firewall configured correctly. Backend health check responding. If 521 persists, may need to check Cloudflare DNS/SSL settings or server IP configuration.
